page.title: 08Industry _ Design skills
page.content: Part of the industrial estate on the South_east side of the area is occupied by a firm producing disposable plastic drinking cups. The company occupies 50,000 sq.metres, ten times the size of the original factory. 130 people are employed there and the plant and machinery are worth about Â£5 million. The plant includes a massive computer_run production unit which is one of only two of its type in the world. This machine can produce up to 48 cups at a time with nearly 30 such cycles per minute _ a possible production rate in excess of 60,000 cups per hour, 14 million cups a week and about 10 million other items.
